DisplayName="CAML query" Name="Query"><RunNowOptions DisplayIndex="0" ControlType="XML" Required="true" GroupWithPrevious="false" /><PrimitiveValue Value="<Query>
 <Lists>
 <List Title="{WorkflowVariable:Library Name}" />
 </Lists>
<Where>
 <Leq>
 <FieldRef Name="Document_x0020_Review_x0020_Date" />
 <Value Type="DateTime">
<Today OffsetDays="{WorkflowVariable:vIntDaysNotice}"/>
</Value>
 </Leq>
 </Where>
 <ViewFields>
 <FieldRef Name="ID" />
 </ViewFields>
 <ViewAttributes Scope="Recursive" />
</Query>
